"Those statues probably attack the passers-by." You nod.

"Guardian Constructs." Nel says. "Definitely. They're slow as all hell, but they hit like trucks."

"There's other players there too." Vision says. "What do we want to do about that?"

"We could hail them," Ayla nods. "But they'll probably just ignore us unless we approach."

You take a couple of steps forward, checking out the other party. It's a group of four, who seem to be chatting around a fire and resting. You can see from here that three definitely have Identifiers, but there's a man in the back without one.

> Hail the party from afar.
> Greet the party, and ask if you can get some items identified.
> Move in for a closer look.
> Go to work on the Guardian Constructs; it doesn't look like a hard fight, and you can keep an eye on the bystanders as you move in.
